verses.roman:
pūrve mahāprabhu more karena sammāna
duḥkha pāi' mane āmi kailuṅ anumāna

synonyms: pūrve—previously; mahāprabhu—Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; more—unto Me; karena—does; sammāna—respect; duḥkha—unhappy; pāi'-becoming; mane—in the mind; āmi—I; kailuṅ—made; anumāna—a plan.
translation: "Formerly Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu always respected Me as His senior, but I did not like such respect. Therefore, My mind being afflicted by unhappiness, I made a plan.
